DOC.brief_summary: Implant placement may trigger bone trauma, which might result in 3-dimensional bone changes. While the process of peri-implant disease is not well understood, implant position within the bony structure might play a role. However, there is no data available on this regard.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Buccal Bone Thickness on Pathological Peri-implant Bone Loss: A 3-year Prospective Cohort Study
